faqs.question: What courses do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a wide range of AI and machine learning courses including Deep Learning Specialization, Machine Learning Specialization, AI for Everyone, Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision, Generative AI with Large Language Models, MLOps Specialization, and TensorFlow courses. All courses are taught by industry experts and academic leaders.

faqs.question: How do I enroll in a course?
faqs.answer: You can enroll in any course by visiting our course catalog, selecting your desired course, and clicking the 'Enroll' button. You'll need to create an account if you don't have one already. The process takes less than 2 minutes.

faqs.question: What are the pricing options?
faqs.answer: We offer individual course purchases starting at $49, monthly subscriptions for $39/month with unlimited access to all courses, and enterprise plans for teams starting at $299/month. Many courses also offer a 7-day free trial so you can explore before committing.

faqs.question: Do you provide certificates?
faqs.answer: Yes! Upon successful completion of a course, you'll receive a shareable certificate that you can add to your LinkedIn profile or resume. Certificates include verification codes and can be shared with employers.

faqs.question: What are the technical requirements?
faqs.answer: You'll need a computer with internet access and a modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge). Some courses may require additional software like Python, Jupyter Notebook, or TensorFlow, which we'll guide you through installing step-by-step.

faqs.question: How can I get help if I'm stuck?
faqs.answer: We provide multiple support channels: discussion forums for each course with peer and instructor support, weekly office hours with instructors, detailed documentation, and our customer support team available via email at support@aieducation.com and chat 24/7.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for individual course purchases. If you're not satisfied for any reason, contact our support team within 30 days of purchase for a full refund, no questions asked.

faqs.question: How long do courses take to complete?
faqs.answer: Course duration varies. Most courses take 4-12 weeks to complete if you study 3-5 hours per week. However, you can learn at your own pace, and course access doesn't expire. Some students finish faster, others take longer.

faqs.question: Do I need prior programming experience?
faqs.answer: It depends on the course. Our 'AI for Everyone' course has no prerequisites and is designed for beginners. Technical courses like Deep Learning Specialization require basic Python programming and linear algebra. Each course page lists specific prerequisites.

faqs.question: Are the certificates recognized by employers?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our certificates are widely recognized in the industry. We partner with leading tech companies and universities. Many of our graduates have successfully used their certificates to advance their careers or transition into AI roles.

faqs.question: Can I access courses on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our platform is fully responsive and works on smartphones and tablets. We also have dedicated iOS and Android apps for learning on the go. However, for coding assignments, we recommend using a laptop or desktop.

faqs.question: How are courses structured?
faqs.answer: Each course consists of video lectures, reading materials, quizzes, and hands-on programming assignments. You'll work on real-world projects and build a portfolio. Most courses include interactive Jupyter notebooks for practice.

faqs.question: Who are the instructors?
faqs.answer: Our courses are taught by world-renowned experts in AI and machine learning, including professors from Stanford, MIT, and other top universities, as well as engineers from leading tech companies like Google, Meta, and OpenAI.

faqs.question: Are courses updated regularly?
faqs.answer: Yes! We continuously update our courses to reflect the latest developments in AI and machine learning. When significant updates are made, enrolled students get free access to the new content.

faqs.question: Is there a community I can join?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have an active community of over 500,000 learners worldwide. You can connect through course discussion forums, our Discord server, monthly meetups, and study groups. Many students form lasting professional connections.

faqs.question: Do you offer career support?
faqs.answer: Yes! Premium subscribers get access to career services including resume reviews, interview preparation, job board access, and connections with hiring partners. We also host regular career webinars and networking events.

faqs.question: Do you offer team or enterprise plans?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our enterprise plans include bulk licenses, custom learning paths, advanced analytics, dedicated account management, and priority support. Contact our enterprise team at enterprise@aieducation.com for a customized quote.

faqs.question: Do you offer financial aid or scholarships?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer need-based financial aid and scholarships for qualified applicants. The application process is simple and confidential. You can apply directly from any course page. We also offer student discounts.

faqs.question: What's the difference between a course and a specialization?
faqs.answer: A course is a single focused topic (typically 4-6 weeks). A specialization is a series of related courses (3-7 courses) that together provide deep expertise in a specific area like Deep Learning or MLOps. Completing a specialization earns you a specialization certificate.

faqs.question: Can I pause my subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can pause your monthly subscription for up to 6 months. Your progress will be saved and you can resume anytime. You can manage your subscription from your account settings page.
